item.title: Why Self-host?
item.description: Let me make the argument why you should start self-hosting more of your personal services.

item.title: A small number of samples can poison LLMs of any size
item.description: Anthropic research on data-poisoning attacks in large language models

item.title: GitHub Will Prioritize Migrating to Azure Over Feature Development
item.description: GitHub is working on migrating all of its infrastructure to Azure, even though this means it'll have to delay some feature development.

item.description: The Apple Calculator leaked 32GB of RAM.
